TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpSimpleClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol
Public MustInherit Class HttpSimpleClientProtocol Inherits HttpWebClientProtocol

summary.span: Represents the base class for communicating with an XML Web service using the simple HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST protocols bindings.

span.span: Represents the base class for communicating with an XML Web service using the simple HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST protocols bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类指定大部分用于通过 HTTP 使用编码器进行编码的参数和返回值转换常见 MIME 格式与 XML Web 服务进行通信的实现。This class specifies most of the implementation for communicating with an XML Web service over HTTP using encoders to encode the parameters and return values into common MIME formats. 这些编码器派生自类。These encoders derive from the class. 默认情况下，派生自的代理类编码在纯 XML 中使用的应用程序/x-响应客户-窗体-urlencoded MIME 类型和响应的参数。By default, a proxy class deriving from encodes parameters using the application/x-www-form-urlencoded MIME type and the response in plain XML. 可以使用指定自定义的 mime 格式化程序属性，但是，没有将其集成到服务说明和代理生成的支持。Custom mime formatters can be specified using the attribute, however, there is no support for integrating this into a service description and proxy generation. `Notes to Inheritors:` 当你重写此类时，可引入派生类中特定于特定类型的 XML Web 服务的方法。`Notes to Inheritors:` When you override this class, you can introduce methods in the derived class that are specific to a particular type of an XML Web service. 方法只需捕获参数，并调用基类，来执行与站点通信的工作。The methods simply capture the parameters, and call the base class to do the work of communicating with the site. 引入的方法是异步的如果调用和方法。If the introduced methods are asynchronous, call the and methods. 引入的方法是同步的如果调用方法。If the introduced methods are synchronous, call the method. 重写构造函数通常设置到 XML Web service 方法的 URI 的属性。The overridden constructor typically sets the property to the URI of the XML Web service method. Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的派生的类有关给定的服务说明。The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) generates derived classes of for a given Service Description. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是由 Wsdl.exe 为生成的代理类`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service below. 代理类派生自，它派生自抽象类。The proxy class derives from , which derives from the abstract class. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpGetClientProtocol Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从中创建前面的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

MemberSignature.Value: protected IAsyncResult BeginInvoke (string methodName, string requestUrl, object[] parameters, AsyncCallback callback, object asyncState);
.method familyhidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginInvoke(string methodName, string requestUrl, object[] parameters, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object asyncState) cil managed
Protected Function BeginInvoke (methodName As String, requestUrl As String, parameters As Object(), callback As AsyncCallback, asyncState As Object) As IAsyncResult
protected: IAsyncResult ^ BeginInvoke(System::String ^ methodName, System::String ^ requestUrl, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ parameters, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ asyncState);

param.name: methodName
param.span: The name of the XML Web service method.

span.span: The name of the XML Web service method.

param.name: requestUrl
param.span: The URL to use when creating the .

span.span: The URL to use when creating the .

param.name: parameters
param.span: An array of objects containing the parameters to pass to the XML Web service method.

span.span: An array of objects containing the parameters to pass to the XML Web service method.

param.span: The order of the values in the array corresponds to the order of the parameters in the calling method of the derived class.

span.span: The order of the values in the array corresponds to the order of the parameters in the calling method of the derived class.

param.name: callback
param.span: The delegate to call when the asynchronous method call is complete.

span.span: The delegate to call when the asynchronous method call is complete.

param.span: If callback is , the delegate is not called.

span.span: If callback is , the delegate is not called.

param.name: asyncState
param.span: The additional information supplied by a client.

summary.span: Starts an asynchronous invocation of a method of an XML Web service.

span.span: Starts an asynchronous invocation of a method of an XML Web service.

returns.span: An that can be passed to the method to obtain the return values from the XML Web service method.

span.span: An that can be passed to the method to obtain the return values from the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `methodName`参数用于查找的参数类型和返回值调用的方法方法。The `methodName` parameter is used to find the types of the parameters and return values of the method that is invoking the method. 它还用于查找可能已添加到该方法的自定义属性。It is also used to find custom attributes that may have been added to the method. ，和派生方法所需的 HTTP 协议提供其他信息。, , and provide additional information on the derived method that is required for the HTTP protocol. `asyncState` 传递到`callback`并且包含在从返回方法。`asyncState` is passed into `callback` and is included in the that is returned from the method. 它可用于将信息从对中的异步结果的处理的异步调用的上下文中传递`callback`。It is useful for passing information from the context of the asynchronous call to the handling of the asynchronous result in `callback`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 ASP.NET Web 窗体，后者将调用 XML Web 服务名为`Math`。The following code example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 在`EnterBtn_Click`函数，Web 窗体启动和完成的异步调用`Add`XML Web service 方法。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form starts and completes an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类的`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service below. 在`BeginAdd`代理类的方法方法会启动异步调用`Add`XML Web service 方法。Within the `BeginAdd` method of the proxy class, the method starts an asynchronous invocation of the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpSimpleClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/source.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从中创建前面的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created.

exception.span: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.

span.span: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `methodName`参数用于查找的参数类型和返回值调用的方法方法。The `methodName` parameter is used to find the types of the parameters and return values of the method that is invoking the method. 它还用于查找自定义属性添加到该方法。It is also used to find custom attributes which may have been added to the method. 和派生方法所需的 SOAP 协议提供其他信息。 and provide additional information on the derived method that is required for the SOAP protocol. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 ASP.NET Web 窗体，后者将调用 XML Web 服务名为`Math`。The following code example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 在`EnterBtn_Click`函数，Web 窗体以同步方式调用`Add`XML Web service 方法。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form synchronously invokes the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-csharp[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#2)] 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类的`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service below. 在`Add`代理类的方法方法以同步方式调用`Add`Web 服务方法。Within the `Add` method of the proxy class, the method synchronously invokes the `Add` Web Service method. [!code-cpp[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpSimpleClientProtocol.Invoke Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从中创建上述的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the above proxy class was created.
